name: MESSAGE_REACTION_ADD
description: Sent when a user adds a reaction to a message.
scopeNote: Guild channels dispatch to guild scope; DMs dispatch to presence scope.

id.description: Emoji ID (only present for custom emoji)

name.description: Emoji name (unicode character or custom emoji name)

animated.description: Whether the emoji is animated (only present for custom emoji)

user_id.description: ID of the user who reacted

session_id.description: Session ID of the user who reacted

guild_id.description: Guild ID (only present for guild channels)

member.description: Guild member object (only present for guild channels)
